channel.title: Please help error execption in "main" : adress already in use
channel.description:
Hey ive been getting this error lately, i portforwarded my rsps but not the orignal way i port forwarded it from utorrent becuase most people i asked said its the same but scince then its been giving me errors.
I dont really have enough time atm i have to go somewhere so i cant post the pic online i will put it in a attachment Please take a look at it.
thank you :)

item.title: Please help error execption in "main" : adress already in use
item.dc:creator: @Sessy_Pk3r Sessy Pk3r
item.description:
@Sessy_Pk3r wrote:

The error tells you what is wrong; I don’t understand the confusion It says the address is already in use meaning you already have an instance of your server running…

Read full topic
item.source: Please help error execption in "main" : adress already in use
